    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanDelete` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanDelete`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanRead` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanRead`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanUpdate` = TRUE)

    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE

    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanRead` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE

    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanCreate` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanCreate`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanDelete` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanDelete`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanRead` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanRead`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanUpdate` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanUpdate`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanConfirm` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanConfirm`
FROM `Functions` AS `f`
LEFT JOIN `Permissions` AS `p` ON `f`.`KeyId` = `p`.`FunctionId`
WHERE `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`RoleId` = @__roleId_0)" (0723d8ff)

        WHERE (`r`.`Name` IN ('WebMaster_AdvertiserCensor') AND (`f`.`KeyId` = @__functionId_1)) AND (`p`.`CanConfirm` = TRUE))
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END" (0723d8ff)

2019-04-22T21:06:22.4653750+07:00 0HLM75CU414J4:0000000A [INF] Executed DbCommand ("3"ms) [Parameters=["@__roleId_0='?' (DbType = Guid)"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT @__roleId_0 AS `RoleId`, `f`.`KeyId` AS `FunctionId`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanCreate` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanCreate`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanDelete` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanDelete`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanRead` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanRead`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanUpdate` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanUpdate`, CASE
    WHEN `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`CanConfirm` = TRUE)
    THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE
END AS `CanConfirm`
FROM `Functions` AS `f`
LEFT JOIN `Permissions` AS `p` ON `f`.`KeyId` = `p`.`FunctionId`
WHERE `p`.`KeyId` IS NOT NULL AND (`p`.`RoleId` = @__roleId_0)" (0723d8ff)
